Title: 9 Mornings
Writer: Antonio Sison (story), Antonio Sison (screenplay), Jose Javier Reyes (screenplay)
Actors: Piolo Pascual, Donita Rose, Dominic Ochoa, Sandy Andolong
Plot: It has been more than a decade since his girlfriend died in a starling accident, but Gene Ynfante (Piolo Pascual) still clearly remembers that fateful day and he is haunted by it. ...
